page.title: 07Transport by Land
page.content: gas,coal,matches,wood,mouse traps,and matches to the holiday cottages. Full the bus trailer with the tractor pulls 24 people. It goes to Carn Near, Old Grimsby,New Grimsby and the heliport to pick people up to take them to their cottages. The tractor carries heavy equipment like gas stoves. Mr.Johnson designed and built all the trucks and trailers.They can fit through all the gates on the island. The trucks have front wheel drive and steering. One of the engines is a Honda,the other is a Wriggly. One runs on gas or petrol. The trailers were made from scraps; old bicycle and barrow wheels,bed frames tent pegs etc., and welded together by Mr D Jenkins. The Estate owns 115 bicycles and six baby trailers for hire to the public.
